title: other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of
heading: 3. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19)
text_raw:
3. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended by the substitution 
of the Schedule to these Regulations for Schedule 3 to those Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th July, 2021.

title: other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) to 
make amendments to the list of “Scheduled Events”.
